title: Congressional Plan To Fund Military Comes With A Side Of 'Land Grab'
teaser: Material tacked onto the authorization bill adds 250,000 acres of new wilderness, expands national parks, and moves toward a national women's history museum. 'Ethically, it stinks,' says Sen. Coburn.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
